ladecall was an arcane spell known in the realm of Cormanthyr.
The spell snatched several blades from elsewhere and sent them flashing point-first, towards a given target.
In , Elminster Aumar used this spell against a number of bandits.
In , during the coup attempt by Llombaerth Starym, the latter attempted to magically compel Elminster Aumar to cast the spell to attack the Srinshee. Elminster later cast this spell on his own to attack Llombaerths forces instead.
